'í•´ì•¼í•œë‹¤ë©´ ì–´ë–»ê²Œë“  ë°©ë²•ì„ ì•Œì•„ë‚´ì–´ ë°˜ë“œì‹œ í•´ë‚´ëŠ” ê²ƒ' í•˜ë‚˜ëŠ” í–ˆë‹¤. ì‚¬ì‹¤ ë‚˜ëŠ” ê·¸ë¿ì¸ê²ƒë„ ê°™ë‹¤.

ê·¸ëŸ¬ë‹¤ ì–¼ë§ˆì „ ì¢‹ì€ ë™ë£Œì™€ ì‚¬ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë§Œë‚˜ ê°™ì´ ì¼í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤. ì²˜ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë§ ì¢‹ì€ ê²½í—˜ì´ì—ˆë‹¤. ë‚œ ì–¸ì œë‚˜ ìŠ¤ìŠ¤ë¡œ ì•Œì•„ì„œ í—¤ì³ë‚˜ê°€ì•¼ë§Œ í–ˆì—ˆëŠ”ë°.. íŒ€ì´ë¼ëŠ”ê²Œ ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ë“ ë“ í•˜ê¸°ë„ í•˜ê³ , ëŒì–´ì£¼ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒì´ ê°€ì´ë“œë¥¼ ì£¼ê³  í‚¤ì›Œë“œë¥¼ ë˜ì ¸ì£¼ë©´ ì˜í•´ë³´ê³  ì‹¶ì–´ì„œ ë‚˜ë„ëª¨ë¥´ê²Œ ê³µë¶€í•˜ëŠ” ë‚˜ë¥¼ ë³´ì•˜ë‹¤. í•¨ê»˜ ì„±ì¥í•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ë¶„ê³¼, ìœ¼ìŒ°ìœ¼ìŒ°í•˜ë©° í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ ì§„í–‰í•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ë¶„, ì™„ì„± í›„ í¼í¬ë¨¼ìŠ¤ì— ëŒ€í•œ ê¸°ëŒ€, ì„¤ê³„ì— ëŒ€í•œ ê³ ë¯¼, í‹°íƒ€ì„, ë³´ë‹¤ ë‚˜ì€ ê°œë°œì„ ìœ„í•œ ë…¼ì˜ë“¤..

ì¦ê±°ì› ë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ°ë° ê²©ë³€í•˜ëŠ” íšŒì‚¬ì˜ ì‚¬ì •ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¨¸ì§€ì•Šì•„ ë¿”ë¿”ì´ í©ì–´ì§€ê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤. í•œ ë²ˆ ì¢‹ì€ê²ƒì„ ë§›ë³´ì•˜ë”ë‹ˆ ê°ˆì¦ì´ ë‚¬ë‹¤. ì¢‹ì€ ì‚¬ëŒë“¤ê³¼ ì¼í•´ë³´ê³  ì‹¶ì—ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ° ê³³ì„ ì°¾ì•„ê°€ê³  ì‹¶ì–´ì¡Œë‹¤. ë‚´ê°€ ì•„ì‰½ë‹¤. ë” ì˜í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì„í…ë° ì´ì •ë„ì¸ ê²ƒì´ ì•„ì‰½ë‹¤. ë‚´ê°€ ë§Œë“  ë‚˜ì˜ ì²œì¥ì´ ë‹µë‹µí•˜ê³  ë²—ì–´ë‚˜ê³  ì‹¶ì–´ì¡Œë‹¤.

ê·¸ë˜ì„œ ê³µë¶€ë¥¼ ì‹œì‘í•œë‹¤.

ìì£¼ ë“¤ì—ˆìœ¼ë‚˜ í•œë²ˆë„ ì œëŒ€ë¡œ ê³ ë¯¼í•œ ì  ì—†ëŠ” ì§ˆë¬¸ì„ ìƒê°í•´ë³´ì•˜ë‹¤.

ë‚˜ëŠ” ì–´ë–¤ ê°œë°œìê°€ ë˜ê³ ì‹¶ì€ê°€?

ë‚˜ ìì‹ ì„ ì•ˆë‹¤ëŠ” ê²ƒì€ ë‚´ ìì‹ ì´ ë¬´ì—‡ì— í¥ë¯¸ë¥¼ ëŠë¼ê³  ë¬´ì—‡ì„ ì˜í•˜ê³  ëª»í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ë¥¼ ì•„ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë¼ê³  í•˜ê² ë‹¤. ë°©í–¥ì´ë€ ë‚˜ì—ê²Œ ë§ì¶°ì§„ ë°©í–¥ì´ê¸°ë„ í•˜ë©°, ê°œë°œì„ ì˜ í•˜ê¸°ìœ„í•œ ë°©í–¥ì´ê¸°ë„ í•˜ë‹¤. ì˜ í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì€ ì‹œê°„ê³¼ ë…¸ë ¥ì„ íˆ¬ìí•´ì•¼ í•¨ì„ ì˜ë¯¸í•œë‹¤.

ë‚˜ ìì‹ ì€ ì–´ë–¤ ì‚¬ëŒì¸ê°€ ì–´ë–¤ ë°©í–¥ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ˆ ê²ƒì¸ê°€ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ ì˜ í•  ê²ƒì¸ê°€

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Getting Started ğŸ˜ 1. Create a Gatsby site. If you are not using , following Gatsby Getting Started 2. Start developing. 3. Add your contentâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Getting Started ğŸ˜

1. Create a Gatsby site.

# create a new Gatsby site using the blog starter
$ npx gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

If you are not using npx, following Gatsby Getting Started

$ npm install -g gatsby-cli
$ gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

2. Start developing.

$ cd my-blog-starter/
$ npm start
# open localhost:8000

3. Add your content

You can writeâ€¦

  • contents to blog in content/blog directory.
  • resume content/__about directory.

With markdown syntax and some meta data

Support script for creating new post

$ npm run post

4. Fix meta data

You can fix meta data of blog in /gatsby-meta-config.js file.

5. Publish with netlify

ğŸ’¡ if you want to deploy github pages, add following script to package.json

"scripts": {
    "deploy": "gatsby build && gh-pages -d public -b master -r 'git@github.com:${your github id}/${github page name}.github.io.git'"
}

:memo: Write a post!

content
â”œâ”€â”€ __about
â””â”€â”€ blog
  • You can register your resume on the web. (in __about directory)
  • You can register your post. (in blog directory)

ğŸ§ Customize!

Gatsby config

/root
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-browser.js // font, polyfill, onClientRender ...
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-config.js // Gatsby config
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-meta-config.js // Template meta config
â””â”€â”€ gatsby-node.js // Gatsby Node config

Structure

src
â”œâ”€â”€ components // Just component with styling
â”œâ”€â”€ layout // home, post layout
â”œâ”€â”€ pages // routing except post: /(home), /about
â”œâ”€â”€ styles
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ code.scss
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ dark-theme.scss
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ light-theme.scss
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ variables.scss
â””â”€â”€ templates
    â”œâ”€â”€ blog-post.js
    â””â”€â”€ home.js

Style

You can customize color in src/styles directory.

src/styles
â”œâ”€â”€ code.scss
â”œâ”€â”€ dark-theme.scss
â”œâ”€â”€ light-theme.scss
â””â”€â”€ variables.scss

Welcome to gatsby-starter-bee! Happy blogging! ğŸ‘»

item.title: Welcome Bee starter
item.description: Welcome, Gatsby! This starter is full-package for your new blog! 1. Support Four frontmatter title date category draft 2. Code highlightingâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Welcome, Gatsby! This starter is full-package for your new blog!

1. Support Four frontmatter

---
title: 'Welcome Bee starter'
date: 2019-2-6 16:21:13
category: 'development'
draft: false
---
  1. title
  2. date
  3. category
  4. draft

2. Code highlighting

  1. With Fira Code font
  2. Support highlighting with prism 2-1. Use inline highlighting
import React from 'react'

const TEMPLATE = 'gatsby-starter-bee'
class Foo extends React.Component {
  handleClick = val => {
    if (val === 'bar') {
      return 1
    } else if (val !== 'zoo') {
      return 2
    }
    console.log(`clicked`)
    return 3
  }

  render() {
    return <div>Welcome, Gatsby, ${TEMPLATE}</div>
  }
}

code

3. Support Markdown (h2)

  1. With Noto Sans font
  2. Support header anchoring

h3

h4

h5

quote!

bold italic

4. Support emoji ğŸš€

Based on emojione ğŸ™

5. Support light/dark mode

6. Support social sharing feature

  1. Twitter
  2. Facebook

Bonus, Buy me a coffee button

Set, buyMeACoffeeId of gatsby-meta-config.js

7. Comments feature

You can add comments feature by selecting one of them.

  • Disqus
  • utterances

8. Support latex

Support latex rendering with katex plugin.

$$\prod_{i=a}^{b} f(i)$$

âˆi=abf(i)\prod_{i=a}^{b} f(i)âˆi=abâ€‹f(i)

9. Other features of this template

  1. You can add resume to /about
  2. Lazy rendering
  3. Scroll restoration
  4. Categorize posts
  5. Offline caching with service worker (based gatsby)
  6. Support GA(Google Analytics)

Letâ€™s Start! Go

item.title: about
item.description: Your name Thank you for reading my resume. If you want to contact me, Please send me an email.
item.content:encoded:
Your name

Thank you for reading my resume. If you want to contact me, Please send me an email.
